name: Whidbey Residential Rentals
address: 285 NE Midway Blvd Ste 2 Oak Harbor, WA 98277

yelp_reviews.author: Lucylyn G.
yelp_reviews.review:
When we first moved here we tried a two other Property Management places first. They were the bigger names around town. The first place it seemed like the owner was the only person working for the company, including doing any and all handyman/repair work. The second place was much different and we thought we liked them a lot. Turns out we didn't, but that's a whole other review. 

Our experience with this office was quick, efficient and very relieving. My husband called up after looking at a couple of listings he was interested in, spoke with Theresa and told her what we were looking for, and she also offered up a few things we passed over. We're really happy she did, because we are now in a town home that has everything we needed and wanted at a very affordable rate. We initially wanted a single family home, because we really wanted a garage, and she encouraged us to look anyways. SFH were more expensive with less room inside and no neighbors with connecting walls. She understood our needs and found us a town home that had a garage and was at the end of the building, so we only have one neighbor with connecting walls. The neighbor is just one guy, who is almost never home and when he is is super quiet. We've met him a few times in the less than a month that we've been here. He's also really nice. I know you can't always pick your neighbors, but Theresa really understood that we are a quiet couple who like our home to be equally as quite, jets excluded, and said she knew this would be a good fit because we match very well with the neighbors.

It means a lot that she would look out more for us and our wants and needs that she did her bottom line. The tenants who stayed here before us kind of messed up the place, and she did an amazing job making sure everything was in clean and working order. Noticing the repair and work orders needed to get this place back in good condition, I know that the cost was just over what she actually made from renting to the young couple over the 6 month lease, but as a responsible property manager she did what she had to do. 

I can respect that completely. My husband and I are planning to buy a house by the end of our lease, and in the event that we have to move, we have already decided that she is going to be the property manager if we decide to rent versus selling.

yelp_reviews.author: Debi S.
yelp_reviews.review: This rental management company is the best. Wonderful staff, caring individuals who take care of their owners and clients. Always helpful, reasonably priced rentals. I would highly recommend these folks for either rental management or rental property.

summary:

The Good

Many users have expressed satisfaction with Whidbey Residential Rentals, highlighting their efficiency and willingness to understand clients' needs. One tenant appreciated that the agent recommended properties the tenant had initially passed over, resulting in a rental that fit their needs and wants at an affordable rate. The company's attention to detail and readiness to offer homes that suit clients' quiet lifestyles have been remarked as significant positives.

Another aspect that resonates positively with users is the commitment to quality from Whidbey Residential Rentals. A customer was impressed by the property manager's dedication to ensuring the rental was in great condition before they moved in, despite the cost of repairs possibly exceeding the rental income from the previous lease. Commitment to maintenance and customer well-being is a recurrent theme from appreciative reviewers.

The Great

User experiences often touch upon the exceptional service offered by the staff at Whidbey Residential Rentals. Reviewers have celebrated the company for having caring individuals who look after both property owners and clients. The personal approach taken by agents, ensuring that clients feel listened to and valued, has consistently been praised.

Regarding the financial aspects, the rentals are reported to be reasonably priced, enhancing overall customer satisfaction. The firm's management practices have been recommended by users who appreciate the level of care and professionalism in handling rental properties for both tenants and property owners. According to the user reviews, this high level of service has led them to recommend Whidbey Residential Rentals for both managing and finding rental properties.

The Bad

The user reviews provided do not indicate any consistent negative experiences related to Whidbey Residential Rentals. The absence of criticisms suggests that the company typically meets or exceeds customer expectations. However, it is essential to consider the possibility of selection bias or a limited number of reviews when evaluating overall performance.

Without specific examples of negligence or unmet expectations, this article cannot substantiate any claims of poor service. Reviewers have not cited issues commonly raised with property management companies, such as unaddressed maintenance concerns, not returning security deposits, or lack of communication. Therefore, it could be interpreted that the company performs adequately in these areas.

The Ugly

In light of the data provided, there have been no mentions of particularly egregious actions or severe complaints lodged against Whidbey Residential Rentals in user reviews. This suggests that the company has not been involved in any major disputes or controversies that have reached the level of public concern or notoriety among its clients.

It should be noted that this article is based on a limited number of user reviews and may not capture the full spectrum of experiences with Whidbey Residential Rentals. As there have been no noted responses to the reviews from the company, there is a lack of additional context that such interactions might provide regarding customer relations or follow-up service.
